instance.description: Buildable structure that blocks enemy vehicle movement (except for heavy crush - bulldozer / tiger).

group.name: container
group.comment:
When the building is under construction it should be passable and light crushable (does not currently work).
When the building is finished construction, it becomes unselectable.
